original_text: King Josiah knocked down the altars that were on the roof of the palace. The kings of Judah had built the altars there, above the high room of King Ahaz. He also knocked down the altars that King Manasseh had built in the two yards of the Lord's temple. Josiah broke the altars into small pieces. He threw the bits into the Kidron Valley.
korean_text: 유다 여러 왕이 아하스의 다락 지붕에 세운 제단들과 므낫세가 여호와의 성전 두 마당에 세운 제단들을 왕이 다 헐고 거기서 빻아내려서 그것들의 가루를 기드론 시내에 쏟아 버리고

sentences.original_text: King Josiah knocked down the altars
that were on the roof of the palace
The kings of Judah had built the altars there
above the high room of King Ahaz
He also knocked down the altars
in the two yards of the Lord's temple
Josiah broke the altars into small pieces
He threw the bits into the Kidron Valley
